getter of mWebView

typeTextInWebElement

public void typeTextInWebElement(By by,
                                 java.lang.String text)
Types text in a WebElement matching the specified By object.

参数：
by - the By object.
text - the text to enter in the field

typeTextInWebElement

public void typeTextInWebElement(By by,
                                 java.lang.String text,
                                 int match)
Types text in a WebElement matching the specified By object.

参数：
by - the By object.
text - the text to enter in the field
match - if multiple objects match, this determines which one will be typed in

clickOnWebElement

public void clickOnWebElement(By by,
                              int match)
Clicks a WebElement matching the specified By object.

参数：
by - the By object.
match - if multiple objects match, this determines which one to click

clickOnWebElement

public void clickOnWebElement(WebElement webElement)
Clicks the specified WebElement.

参数：
webElement - the WebElement to click

waitForWebElement

public boolean waitForWebElement(By by)
Waits for a WebElement matching the specified By object. Default timeout is 20 seconds.

参数：
by - the By object.
返回：
true if the WebElement is displayed and false if it is not displayed before the timeout

clickOnWebElement

public void clickOnWebElement(By by,
                              int match,
                              boolean scroll)
Clicks on a web element using the given By method

参数：
by - the By object.
match - if multiple objects match, this determines which one will be clicked
scroll - true if scrolling should be performed

scrollWebView

public boolean scrollWebView(int direction)
Scrolls a WebView.

参数：
webView - the WebView to scroll
direction - the direction to scroll
allTheWay - true to scroll the view all the way up or down, false to scroll one page up or down or down.
返回：
true if more scrolling can be done

clickOnScreen

public void clickOnScreen(float x,
                          float y)
Clicks on a given coordinate on the screen.

参数：
x - the x coordinate
y - the y coordinate

enterTextInWebElement

public void enterTextInWebElement(By by,
                                  java.lang.String text)
Enters text in a WebElement matching the specified By object.

参数：
by - the By object.
text - the text to enter in the WebElement field

clearTextInWebElement

public void clearTextInWebElement(By by)
Clears text in a WebElement matching the specified By object.

参数：
by - the By object.

getWebElement

public WebElement getWebElement(By by,
                                int index)
Returns a WebElement matching the specified By object and index.

参数：
by - the By object.
index - the index of the WebElement. 0 if only one is available
返回：
a WebElement matching the specified index

getCurrentWebElements

public java.util.ArrayList<WebElement> getCurrentWebElements()
Returns an ArrayList of WebElements displayed in the active WebView.

返回：
an ArrayList of the WebElement objects currently displayed in the active WebView

getTextViewsFromWebView

public java.util.ArrayList<android.widget.TextView> getTextViewsFromWebView()
Returns an ArrayList of TextViews displayed in the active WebView.

返回：
an ArrayList of the TextView objects currently displayed in the active WebView
